name: Spooky Story
description:
Spooky story - In this creepy platformer, you will get the role of a magic mushroom that went hunting for the treasures of elves. Collect all the gems on your way to beat the new high score and get achievements! The player is waiting for a pleasant classic platformer gameplay - careful jumping on numerous platforms will lead you to your goal, but it all depends on your dexterity!


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
